title: Designing a Function Machine Learning Environment for Elementary Students' Understanding of Variables

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics pedagogy fundamentals, function concept comprehension, and project-based learning experience
context.additional_context: Practice variable concept teaching methods in a smartphone-based low-tech environment and develop strategies applicable to elementary education curriculum design.

learning_goals: Designing at least three instructional strategies for teaching variable concepts using function machine models
Explaining the developmental stages of elementary students' understanding of variables in three distinct phases
Creating an assessment rubric to prevent learner misconceptions (e.g., recognizing text as labels) when designing input-output activities using smartphone apps

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
